name: Beet, Oats, Grabanzo Bean/Chickepea Burger Sliders
description: Beet, Oats, Garbanzo Bean/Chickpea Burger Sliders served topped with tomatoes, basil or baby greens between multigrain olive oil buns. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup garbanzo beans/chickpeas ((washed and drained if canned, cooked till soft after soaking overnight, if dry beans))
1 tablespoon thick tomato paste or pureed roasted tomato.
1/4 teaspoon chili powder/chili flakes/black pepper (or to taste)
1/2 teaspoon chole/chana masala powder ((See Notes or garam masala or spice mix(cajun or Mediterranean) of choice))

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add grated beet, mashed garbanzo beans, mashed potato. Mix and mash well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add grated beet, mashed garbanzo beans, mashed potato. Mix and mash well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt, olive oil, tomato paste and spices. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt, olive oil, tomato paste and spices. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture will get a little damp because of the salt and spices. Add half of the ground oats and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture will get a little damp because of the salt and spices. Add half of the ground oats and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add more oats if needed to get the mixture to a dry enough state to make flat balls/ patties.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more oats if needed to get the mixture to a dry enough state to make flat balls/ patties.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the patties on the remaining oats on a plate, to stick the coarse oatmeal on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the patties on the remaining oats on a plate, to stick the coarse oatmeal on both sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Place patties on parchment paper on a baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Place patties on parchment paper on a baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F, for 15-20 minutes or until the patties start to feel crisp on the outside.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F, for 15-20 minutes or until the patties start to feel crisp on the outside.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately with dipping sauce, or top some greens or in sliders, or cool on rack and store in refrigerator for 2-3 days! Have a fun meatless Tuesday!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately with dipping sauce, or top some greens or in sliders, or cool on rack and store in refrigerator for 2-3 days! Have a fun meatless Tuesday!

recipeInstructions.text: Notes: Chana/Chole Masala Powder Recipe: Dry roast and grind a teaspoon each of dry pomegranate seeds, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, with 1/2 teaspoon each cinnamon powder,black peppercorns and 1 dry red chili. Or you can buy it from any Indian Spice store!.
recipeInstructions.name: Notes: Chana/Chole Masala Powder Recipe: Dry roast and grind a teaspoon each of dry pomegranate seeds, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, with 1/2 teaspoon each cinnamon powder,black peppercorns and 1 dry red chili. Or you can buy it from any Indian Spice store!.

keywords: beetroot burger, vegan burger patties, vegetable burger
